availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Adair County and Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Culpepper County, Virginia native. Married to Mary E. Yates. Father of F. J. Yates, E. E. Yates, James H. Yates, John A. Yates, William T. Yates, Nancy B. Yates, Hiram P. Yates, and Joseph H. Yates. Farmer in Adair County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Adair County in 1860. Resident of Hopkins County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 1, p. 53B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 1, p. 131-32.
